Author: amichail
Content: Effort could be determined by how much coding gets done each day, how many hours worked, etc.

Author: amichail
Title: Your percentile rank in terms of effort among single founders is... (build a service to motivate single founders to try harder)

Author: herdrick
Content: I really think OO has been a net loss for the industry and individual programmers. Attaching all functions to data structures, inheritance, hiding fields... these are a net loss. (And about that field hiding aspect of encapsulation - Who are we hiding them from? I ask you.)

Author: far33d
Title: The Long Tail Is Getting Fatter

Author: willarson
Content: Numbers are a bit lower than I would have expected. Thank you for pointing me in the direction.

Author: pg
Content: Really, it only needs to work on Safari?  What if someone, say, posted it to a site that links to newly launched applications?  Might it not then be convenient if the app worked for whatever browser the users following those links were using?
